atst.giss.abplc

Class ABPlcioConnectionGis

  • java.lang.Object
    • atst.giss.abplc.ABPlcioConnection
      • atst.giss.abplc.ABPlcioConnectionGis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IABPlcioConnection, IABPlcioConnectionGis

    public class ABPlcioConnectionGis
extends ABPlcioConnection
implements IABPlcioConnectionGis
    This is the GISS connection class used by GIS controller atst.giss to communicate with the GIS PLC.

    The controller has its connection object of this class created for it by the CSF, as the controller defines this class as its .connection:class

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String[] addresses)
             throws ConnectionException
        Called by CSF when connection's component receives startup command. This in turn calls super class' ABPlcioConnection#connect(String[]).

        Following return from super's doConnect this method carries out GIS connection specific initialization required.

        Overrides:
        connect in class ABPlcioConnection
        Parameters:
        addresses - The network address of the GIS PLC obtained by the CSF from the component's .connection:address propertyDB attribute.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - When any failure occurs from which the connection cannot recover.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
                throws ConnectionException
        Overrides:
        disconnect in class ABPlcioConnection
        Throws:
        ConnectionException

      • getLogCatsUsed

        public java.lang.String[] getLogCatsUsed()
        Overrides IABPlcioConnection#getLogCatsUsed() to add GIS connection specific log categories.

        Calls super getLogCatsUsed() and appends this class' log categories.

        Specified by:
        getLogCatsUsed in interface IABPlcioConnection
        Overrides:
        getLogCatsUsed in class ABPlcioConnection
        Returns:
        A string array containing all log categories used by the connection.

        public java.lang.Boolean getGICInterlockStatus()
        Description copied from interface: IABPlcioConnectionGis
        Returns the Interlock Status of Global Interlock Controller

        Read posted atst.giss.ghc.cStatus GIC_Interlock_Status. If a tag status is BAD GIC_Interlock_Status will be set to false, if GOOD set to true

        Specified by:
        getGICInterlockStatus in interface IABPlcioConnectionGis
        Returns:
        Boolean status of GIC tags.
